    AbstractReadTask<T>
    An abstract Modbus 'AbstractTask' is holding references to one or more Modbus AbstractModbusElement which have register addresses in the same range.
    AbstractTask
    An abstract Modbus 'AbstractTask' is holding references to one or more Modbus ModbusElement which have register addresses in the same range.
    FC16WriteRegistersTask
    Implements a Write Holding Registers Task, using Modbus function code 16 (http://www.simplymodbus.ca/FC16.htm).
    FC1ReadCoilsTask
    Implements a Read Coils Task, implementing Modbus function code 1 (http://www.simplymodbus.ca/FC01.htm).
    FC2ReadInputsTask
    Implements a Read Inputs Task, implementing Modbus function code 2 (http://www.simplymodbus.ca/FC02.htm).
    FC3ReadRegistersTask
    Implements a Read Holding Register Task, implementing Modbus function code 3 (http://www.simplymodbus.ca/FC03.htm).
    FC4ReadInputRegistersTask
    Implements a Read Input Register Task, implementing Modbus function code 4 (http://www.simplymodbus.ca/FC04.htm).
    FC5WriteCoilTask
    Implements a Write Single Coil Task, using Modbus function code 5 (http://www.simplymodbus.ca/FC05.htm).
    FC6WriteRegisterTask
     
    ReadTask
    A Modbus 'ReadTask' is holding references to one or more Modbus AbstractModbusElement which have register addresses in the same range.
